text_logic_form: The triangles $DEF$ and $CBF$ are similar to each other.
The perimeter of triangle $CBF$ is $27$ units.
The length of the line $DF$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $FC$ is $8$ units.

line_instances: There are lines $AD$, $AC$, $AB$, $AE$, $DC$, $DB$, $DE$, $DF$, $CB$, $CE$, $CF$, $BE$, $BF$, and $EF$ forming the triangles $DEF$ and $CBF$.
The lines $DF$ and $FC$ are the sides of triangle $CBF$.
The lines $DE$, $EF$, and $FD$ are the sides of triangle $DEF$.
